FreelanceText.1: I like to code things from scratch, and enjoy bringing ideas to life in the browser.

BackgroundText.1: Currently I work at Santander Bank as Frontend Developer and at Ironhack Bootcamp as Teacher Assistant

AcademicTimelineTitle.2: University of Applied Sciences - Frankfurt am Main

AcademicTimelineDescription.1: Bootcamp of Web Development. Subjects: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Node, Express, Mongo and REACT.
AcademicTimelineDescription.2: I got an government scholarship to study for one and half year at Germany. There, I studied at Fachhochshule Frankfurt am Main (University of Applied Sciences) electrical engineer in renewable energy field. I also did some subjects about programming, finances and business.
AcademicTimelineDescription.3: I studied electrical engineer, and there I made some volunteer work. Like 'Luz, Ciência e Emoção' and 'Projeto Lux'.

ProfessionalTimelineDescription.1: Helping the main teacher of Ironhack's part-time Web Development course. Subjects: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Node, Express, Mongo and REACT.
ProfessionalTimelineDescription.2: Current working at a startup of Santander: Empréstimos Sim. Using Vue.js, Typescript, Git, CSS
ProfessionalTimelineDescription.3: Worked at Santander and Sky clients, using Vue.js, Typescript, Git, CSS
ProfessionalTimelineDescription.4:
Intern at 'Talent Factory' program:
- Development of projects focused on quality improvement, performance and cost reduction
- Support of Head of Production with PDCA Cycle, 5S and Kaizen Methodology
- Experience in different positions at the factory, like Operator (working with weld spot), Senior Operator and Quality Analyst
